name: Spicy Chicken Tacos
desc: Grilled chicken seasoned with spices, served in soft tortillas with salsa, guacamole, and sour cream.

name: Mediterranean Salad Bowl
desc: A refreshing salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and a tangy lemon vinaigrette.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
desc: Slow-cooked pulled pork smothered in smoky barbecue sauce, served on a toasted bun with coleslaw on the side.

name: Vegetarian Pad Thai
desc: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, carrots, and peanuts, tossed in a flavorful tamarind sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
desc: A classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Butter Chicken
desc: Grilled salmon glazed with teriyaki sauce, served on a bed of steamed rice with stir-fried vegetables.

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
desc: Arborio rice cooked with mushrooms, onions, garlic, and Parmesan cheese, creating a rich and creamy dish.

name: Chicken Biryani
desc: Tender beef, black beans, rice, salsa, shredded lettuce, cheese, and a dollop of sour cream in a bowl.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
desc: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey, molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Crispy Chicken Wings
desc: Golden and crispy chicken wings served with your choice of dipping sauce.
